Description: Handle of perhaps Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp
Curator's comments: Only known from Petrie's drawing in his Journal, 1884-5, p.28a, 3. Thr Rhodian fabricant Dioysios IV often uses the nominative in his stamps, but not the sigma with splayed top and bottom hastae; hence uncertainty about the identification. Name, Dionysios.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1483)
